name: WYOConECT-ConnectingWyomingEducatorsbyCommun
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Each daily flash briefing will focus on a variety of educational and school related topics. On Motivation and Mentoring Mondays we will share motivational quotes and mentoring strategies that will help make your partnership be as effective as possible. Try it Tuesdays provide classroom application ideas you can test out during the week. Current research- and evidence-based best practices in instruction and special education will take center stage on What Works Wednesdays. Think About it Thursdays are for broadening your horizons and clarifying your educational beliefs about essential questions in education. Facts and Feedback Friday will provide the nitty-gritty information and important dates you need to have for a successful residency experience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
